alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 21 at 8:54PM MST until August 22 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Arizona, including the following county, Pima. * WHEN...Until midnight MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 854 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Mammoth Wash, Sil Nakya Wash, Aguirre Wash, Pan Tak Wash, House Wash, San Vicente Wash, Tiro Wash, El, Anegan Wash and Viopuli Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Queens Well and Sil Nakya. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
